description: There are not a lot of desserts where when you take fat and sweetness from it that it still tastes good.  While I didn't go too extreme with this recipe (had tried that with an earlier one - fail) - substituting a stick of butter for an avocado and reducing the sugar by a little over a third, it still came out delicious and moist with that rich, buttery, pound cake flavor.
title: Less Sugar Blueberry Avocado Pound Cake
